channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yet another flytip of household items, 14th January
item.description:
I don’t know about you but I’m getting really bored of people just dumping stuff when they can’t be bothered to dispose of it properly. Yet another flytip in the same space overnight. Can we have a camera please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Challin Street, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 14th January
item.description:
This vehicle has been dumped here for 2+ months Outside 22 Moundfield Rd it doesn't have a parking permit as I see it getting parking tickets every day, it takes away parking spaces from the neighbours that do pay for parking Please can this be resolvASAP

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Moundfield Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox found, 14th January
item.description:
Found dead Fox in garden (on Mon), tried to remove but it was stuck in place and took a long time till today. Have now bagged it up for disposal, it's quite heavy and needs collection promptly before decomposes further. I gather you can collect from the edge of my property, so I'll place the bag at end of driveway when you confirm when you can collect please? Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Welbeck Avenue, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big pothole Orpington road, 14th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orpington Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
